title: 【武漢肺炎】Deliveroo改計薪制變相減薪3成 外送員稱近千人罷工討公道

replies.msg:
漢肺炎疫情嚴峻時餐飲外送平台大行其道，員工收入增加，但疫情退減後外賣生意驟減，有外送平台疑藉更改薪金制度減薪。有超過4,000名外送員的外賣平台Deliveroo（戶戶送）上周六起更改計薪制度，外送員聲稱基本收入因此變相減少近三成，員工聲稱近千人由上周六起參與「按章工作」的工業行動，希望公司收回成命，恢復舊薪酬制度，有員工稱今次行動形同罷工。近百送餐員今午3時許在中環9號碼頭聚集後，一行人4時許更前往Deliveroo中環的辦處，尋求與公司代表面對面談判。若談判破裂，工會代指不排除把行動升級。

新的計薪制度取消了每單最低費用即薪金保障把將外送員每單收取的服務費改為訂單費用再加「加乘獎金」，每周接單率超過8成者，才能獲取等如每張單基金薪酬百分之三十的「加乘獎金」，變相限制外送員不能拒絕接單。有員工指以電單車手為例，每張單基本收入由50元減少至僅得大約35元，形同減薪3成，苦不堪言，正蘊釀把工業行動升級討公道。
https://hk.news.appledaily.com/breaking/20200525/ITK4FQEZQYTXNL3TIAM4IGQRXU/

事實證明罷工先係皇道

replies.msg:
We, as long-term freelancing riders of Deliveroo, are sorry to inform the public about the fiasco of the delivery company’s newly introduced policy change surrounding our incomes, already to cause a sensation in social media and networking, including our customers. Of which, the company has failed its promise to deduct the delivery fee of short-distancing orders on the one end, and to increase that of long-distancing ones on the other, and which, as 1,400 freelancing contractors amongst us reflect, have not secured, if not boosted, our total incomes as planned. The delivery fees, no matter with any distance, have plummeted to a new low, and which, as many reckon, seems to be the company’s scheme to wax our revenues, in spite of what it has claimed in the first place. But above all, some of us have no orders at all for a whole day and, with the company’s recent abjuration of “guaranteed minimum wage”, we have no income at all, despite the company has required us to stand outside restaurants in the sun for a better chance at receiving orders. In the past, the company did terminate the contracts of few freelancers who did not stay close enough to restaurants. In light of this, many of us across races and cultures unanimously feel the need to start this non-cooperation movement, not to allow the company to look askance at its problematic operation system. We are hereby making the following demands: 1) All order fees should go back to the normal price level, wherein they should be at least HK$35 for walkers and cyclists, and HK$55 for motorbike riders. 2) “A guaranteed minimum wage” should be restored. 3) A requirement of 80% acceptance rate should be reconsidered. Starting from the evening of May 24th, we will take actions involving delaying order deliveries and skives, and which, as we promise, will keep in line with food safety as possible as we can. We are sorry to bring inconveniences to customers, as we estimate there will be a longer waiting time for each order than it should be, whereas we encourage them not to place any orders until the company takes a responsible action to improve working conditions. We will not rule out possibilities to escalate our action to another level, if the company continues to be irresponsive as it is now. Last but not least, we hope to serve our customers again in a near future, whereas everything will be restored to the normal, if not a better, state.


J呢篇嘢J咗超級耐

quote.msg:
漢肺炎疫情嚴峻時餐飲外送平台大行其道，員工收入增加，但疫情退減後外賣生意驟減，有外送平台疑藉更改薪金制度減薪。有超過4,000名外送員的外賣平台Deliveroo（戶戶送）上周六起更改計薪制度，外送員聲稱基本收入因此變相減少近三成，員工聲稱近千人由上周六起參與「按章工作」的工業行動，希望公司收回成命，恢復舊薪酬制度，有員工稱今次行動形同罷工。近百送餐員今午3時許在中環9號碼頭聚集後，一行人4時許更前往Deliveroo中環的辦處，尋求與公司代表面對面談判。若談判破裂，工會代指不排除把行動升級。

新的計薪制度取消了每單最低費用即薪金保障把將外送員每單收取的服務費改為訂單費用再加「加乘獎金」，每周接單率超過8成者，才能獲取等如每張單基金薪酬百分之三十的「加乘獎金」，變相限制外送員不能拒絕接單。有員工指以電單車手為例，每張單基本收入由50元減少至僅得大約35元，形同減薪3成，苦不堪言，正蘊釀把工業行動升級討公道。
https://hk.news.appledaily.com/breaking/20200525/ITK4FQEZQYTXNL3TIAM4IGQRXU/

我全力支持員工嘅工業行動，加油

We, as long-term freelancing riders of Deliveroo, are sorry to inform the public about the fiasco of the delivery company’s newly introduced policy change surrounding our incomes, already to cause a sensation in social media and networking, including our customers. Of which, the company has failed its promise to deduct the delivery fee of short-distancing orders on the one end, and to increase that of long-distancing ones on the other, and which, as 1,400 freelancing contractors amongst us reflect, have not secured, if not boosted, our total incomes as planned. The delivery fees, no matter with any distance, have plummeted to a new low, and which, as many reckon, seems to be the company’s scheme to wax our revenues, in spite of what it has claimed in the first place. But above all, some of us have no orders at all for a whole day and, with the company’s recent abjuration of “guaranteed minimum wage”, we have no income at all, despite the company has required us to stand outside restaurants in the sun for a better chance at receiving orders. In the past, the company did terminate the contracts of few freelancers who did not stay close enough to restaurants. In light of this, many of us across races and cultures unanimously feel the need to start this non-cooperation movement, not to allow the company to look askance at its problematic operation system. We are hereby making the following demands: 1) All order fees should go back to the normal price level, wherein they should be at least HK$35 for walkers and cyclists, and HK$55 for motorbike riders. 2) “A guaranteed minimum wage” should be restored. 3) A requirement of 80% acceptance rate should be reconsidered. Starting from the evening of May 24th, we will take actions involving delaying order deliveries and skives, and which, as we promise, will keep in line with food safety as possible as we can. We are sorry to bring inconveniences to customers, as we estimate there will be a longer waiting time for each order than it should be, whereas we encourage them not to place any orders until the company takes a responsible action to improve working conditions. We will not rule out possibilities to escalate our action to another level, if the company continues to be irresponsive as it is now. Last but not least, we hope to serve our customers again in a near future, whereas everything will be restored to the normal, if not a better, state.


J呢篇嘢J咗超級耐

quote.msg:
漢肺炎疫情嚴峻時餐飲外送平台大行其道，員工收入增加，但疫情退減後外賣生意驟減，有外送平台疑藉更改薪金制度減薪。有超過4,000名外送員的外賣平台Deliveroo（戶戶送）上周六起更改計薪制度，外送員聲稱基本收入因此變相減少近三成，員工聲稱近千人由上周六起參與「按章工作」的工業行動，希望公司收回成命，恢復舊薪酬制度，有員工稱今次行動形同罷工。近百送餐員今午3時許在中環9號碼頭聚集後，一行人4時許更前往Deliveroo中環的辦處，尋求與公司代表面對面談判。若談判破裂，工會代指不排除把行動升級。

新的計薪制度取消了每單最低費用即薪金保障把將外送員每單收取的服務費改為訂單費用再加「加乘獎金」，每周接單率超過8成者，才能獲取等如每張單基金薪酬百分之三十的「加乘獎金」，變相限制外送員不能拒絕接單。有員工指以電單車手為例，每張單基本收入由50元減少至僅得大約35元，形同減薪3成，苦不堪言，正蘊釀把工業行動升級討公道。
https://hk.news.appledaily.com/breaking/20200525/ITK4FQEZQYTXNL3TIAM4IGQRXU/
